name: Xcolors
body:
### Welcome to the Linux BBQ GitHub
Please feel free to browse the menu and have a taste

### On The Menu
  * [Color Palettes for X](https://github.com/linuxbbq/xcolors/tree/master/xcolor_code)  
  * [Palette Visuals](https://github.com/linuxbbq/xcolors/tree/master/xcolor_visual)  
  * [Patches](https://github.com/linuxbbq/xcolors/tree/master/scripts)   

### Wearing Aprons and Wielding Spatulas 
@machinebacon, @DebianJoe, @wuxmedia, @dkeg, @ivanovnegro, @pidsley

### In the Spotlight
bbq  
![bbq](http://s19.postimg.org/71ol8jqtf/bbq.png)

### Sample Color Schemes
* [rocks](http://postimg.org/image/4ukckmlj3/)  
* [flatgraytwo](http://postimg.org/image/6avv2rofz/)  
* [stormed](http://postimg.org/image/trnq1ja0v/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
